Text: The Internets IRS tax solution omzlPST Dealing with Tax debt is a serious problem The IRS is currently EXPANDING to deal with UNPAID tax cases its just a matter of time before they get to YOU We can help you we negotiate with the IRS on your behalf and can get you back on top of your Taxes for just cents on the Dollar You wont have to worry about interest or late payment penalties losing your income or seizure of any assets by government agencies With the help of nationally recognized tax attorneys paralegals legal assistants and licensed enrolled agents we work for YOU not the IRS We offer full third party handling meaning we represent your case and defend you You will never be contacted by the IRS Infact you wont ever have to deal with an IRS agent again we will do it all for YOU Let us help you pay your taxes making things easier for you Just reply to this email and provide the information in the form below This is a free no obligation service and all information is kept private Offer applies to citizens of the USA Full Name State Home Phone Work Phone Best Time to Call EMail Address Estimated Tax Debt Size Including fines and interest fee We want to help you get back control of your taxes and make life easier Thanks for your time To be Removed from this list Please reply with Remove in the subject line and you will be removed within hours
